Good afternoon!

I am wondering: of all the translations of Miyamoto Musashi's book 'The Book of 5 Spheres (or Rings)....  which one is the most 
accurate?

Secondly, I am wondering if anyone has read Thomas Cleary's 'The Art of Japanese War' (1992), and would like to hear your thoughts 
on it.

Obediently,

Lizzie
